mapper.sql: id, model_id, code, name, sort, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, start_x, start_y, height, width
mapper.insert: insert into oa_flow_model_element (id, model_id, code, name, sort, status, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, start_x, start_y, height, width ) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )

insert into oa_flow_model_element
id,
model_id,
code,
name,
sort,
status,
create_by,
create_date,
update_by,
update_date,
remarks,
start_x,
start_y,
height,
width,

#{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update oa_flow_model_element
model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT},
update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_x = #{startX,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_y = #{startY,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
width = #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update oa_flow_model_element set model_id = #{modelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=BIGINT}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_x = #{startX,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_y = #{startY,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, height = #{height,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, width = #{width,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: SELECT a.model_id AS modId, a.`code` AS `code`, b.element_id AS modElementId, b.element_config AS modConfig FROM oa_flow_model_element a INNER JOIN oa_flow_model_element_config b ON a.id = b.element_id WHERE a.model_id = #{modId} AND a.code = #{code}

SELECT * FROM oa_flow_model_element WHERE 1 = 1
and status = #{status}

SELECT e.id,e.mod_id,e.mod_uuid,e.`code`,e.`name`,cf.mod_config AS param,lg.cur_assignee FROM oa_process_log lg LEFT JOIN oa_process p ON lg.process_id = p.id LEFT JOIN oa_flow_mod m ON m.id = p.mod_id LEFT JOIN oa_flow_mod_element e ON e.mod_id = m.id AND e.`code` = lg.cur_node LEFT JOIN oa_flow_mod_config cf ON cf.mod_element_id = e.id WHERE lg.process_id = #{processId} ORDER BY lg.create_date ASC
